select t1.parentItemCode itemCode,t1.parentItemName itemName, round(case when sum(IFNULL(t2.cnt2,0))=0 then 0 else sum(IFNULL(t3.cnt3,0))/sum(t2.cnt2) * 1.00 end,2) count
from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, parent.id as parentItemCode, parent.item_name as parentItemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb, hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo parent where hcb.parent_item_code = parent.id and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(outin_count) cnt2 from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital
left join ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(Inp) cnt3 from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate}
group by t.hospital ) t3 on t1.itemCode = t3.hospital where t3.cnt3>0 group by t1.parentItemName order by t1.seqNo

select t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id itemCode, case t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id when 1 then "一级医院" when 2 then "二级医院" when 3 then "三级医院" when 4 then "社区医院" else "" end itemName, round(sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0))/sum( case when t2.cnt>0 then 1 else 0 end),2) count from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo t1 left join (select t1.item_code itemCode,t1.item_name itemName, round(case when IFNULL(t2.cnt2,0)=0 then 0 else IFNULL(t3.cnt3,0)/t2.cnt2 * 1.00 end,2) cnt from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo t1 left join (select t.hospital hospital, sum(outin_count) cnt2 from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.item_code = t2.hospital left join (select t.hospital hospital, sum(Inp) cnt3 from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} and t.dept_code !='CW001' and t.dept_code !='tj001' group by t.hospital ) t3 on t1.item_code = t3.hospital where t1.item_code in and length(t1.item_code)=10 and t3.cnt3>0 ) t2 on t1.item_code = t2.itemCode where t1.id in and t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id is not null and t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id!="" and length(t1.item_code)=10 and t2.cnt>0 group by t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id;

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,t0.dateData dateData, t0.count count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id in ) t1 left join (select t2.dateData,t2.hospital, round(case when IFNULL(t2.InpCount,0)=0 then 0 else IFNULL(t3.Inp,0)/t2.InpCount * 1.00 end,2) count from ( select t.hospital hospital, date_format(t.VISIT_DATE,#{dateFormater}) dateData, sum(outin_Count) InpCount from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.hospital in AND Visit_date >= #{startDate} AND Visit_date <= #{endDate} group by t.hospital,dateData ) t2 , ( select t.hospital hospital, date_format(t.visit_date,#{dateFormater}) dateData, sum(Inp) Inp from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in AND Visit_date >= #{startDate} AND Visit_date <= #{endDate} group by t.hospital,dateData ) t3 where t2.hospital = t3.hospital and t2.dateData = t3.dateData) t0 on t1.itemCode = t0.hospital order by t1.itemCode
